comment: A relationship between the rank function and the cumulative hierarchy of sets function ` R1 ` . Proposition 9.15(2) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 79. (Contributed by NM, 6-Oct-2003.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)
